sentence: Let's show them we're NOT backing down: https://t.co/4OXYM6kWP5 pic.twitter.com/o6xQ538lJz Mandela Barnes (@TheOtherMandela) December 20, 2021
title: The way forward is to view Manchin and Sinema as opportunities not just as obstacles

sentence: MADISON, Wis. (AP) - Former state Rep. Mandela Barnes said Wednesday that he is strongly considering? running for lieutenant governor next year, making him the first prominent Democrat to express interest in the position.
author: SCOTT BAUER
title: Former state Rep. Barnes considering run for lt. gov.
